text: khe bamream sang daoy khe bamream haey( anak del bampean leu) brakear bamream teanglay ku trauv kattosa smae knea . hetonih anaknea del ban romlophbampean leu puok anak chaur puok anak veayobk towleu ke vinh dauch avei delke ban romlophbampean mk leu puok anak der . haey chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh ning chreab tha pit brakd nasa a l laoh now cheamuoy banda anak del kaotakhlach trong
